snippet.title: [セガサターン] マジカルドロップIII | Magical Drop III (Tech Saturn 1997/9)
snippet.description:
Okay, there's a whole bunch of distinct Magical Drop III demos on Sega Saturn for some reason, but I'm starting with this one - one of the last ones put out - because it's rather "special".

The playable character in this one is Tech Saturn's waifu-mascot "32-idol Saturn-chan". (Not to be confused with the Saturn of Sega Hard Girls)
She basically is given her own miniature story mode with her own spriteset and lines of dialog with her opponents. Quite a few things are likely references to her appearances in prior Tech Saturn issues, of which I may have to sort through in case there's more interesting stuff like this.
